info.title: Medical Record Management API
info.description: API for managing medical records, user registration, user authentication, and OTP verification.

post.description: Allows an admin to register a new user with details like name, email, and role.

first_name.description: The first name of the user

last_name.description: The last name of the user

country_code.description: The country code of the phone number (e.g., +1)

phone_number.description: The phone number of the user

user_role.description: The role of the user (admin or user)

message.example: User registered successfully

invalid.example: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Invalid user role, must be 'admin' or 'user'

post.summary: Allows the user to reset their password using a token
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to reset their password by providing a valid token and a new password.

new_password.description: The new password to be set

message.example: Password reset successful

too_short.example: Password must be at least 8 characters long

message.example: The reset token has expired or is invalid
Password does not meet security requirements
No user associated with this token
An error occurred while resetting the password

post.summary: Authenticates user based on email and password
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password.

password.description: The password of the user (in plaintext)

message.example: Login successful

refresh_token.description: JWT refresh token for renewing the access token

message.example: Incorrect email or password
This account has been deactivated. Contact support.
No user exists with this email
An error occurred during login

post.summary: Validates the OTP entered by the user
post.description: This endpoint validates the OTP code entered by the user for verification.

otp_code.description: The OTP code entered by the user

message.example: OTP verified successfully

refresh_token.description: JWT refresh token for renewing the access token

message.example: The OTP is incorrect or expired

429.description: Too Many Requests (OTP verification limit exceeded)

message.example: You have exceeded the number of OTP verifications allowed
An error occurred while verifying OTP

post.summary: Resend a new OTP to the user if it expired or wasn't received
post.description: This endpoint allows the user to request a new OTP if the previous one expired or wasn't received.

user_id.description: The ID of the user requesting the OTP resend

message.example: OTP sent successfully

429.description: Too Many Requests (OTP resend limit exceeded)

message.example: You have exceeded the number of OTP requests within the allowed time frame
An error occurred while resending OTP

get.summary: Retrieves all users in the system (Admin Only)
get.description: Allows an admin to fetch all users in the system.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication (Admin Only)

message.example: Admin authentication required. Please provide a valid admin token.
You do not have permission to access this resource. Ensure you have the required admin permissions.
There are no users in the system.
An unexpected error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific user by their user_id.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve details for.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication

message.example: User details retrieved successfully.
User authentication required. Please provide a valid authentication token.
You do not have permission to access this resource. Ensure you are authorized to view this user's details.
No user exists with the given user_id
An unexpected error occurred while retrieving user details. Please try again later.

patch.description: Allows an admin to update a user's details.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication

message.example: User updated successfully.

user_role.invalid: Invalid user role, must be 'admin' or 'user'

message.example: You must be authenticated as an admin to update user details.
You do not have permission to update this user.
No user exists with the given user_id.
An unexpected error occurred while updating user details. Please try again later.

get.summary: Get details of a specific case
get.description: Fetches details of a specific case by its case_id.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID associated with the case.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The ID of the case to fetch details for.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication.

message.example: Case details retrieved successfully
The provided user_id or case_id format is incorrect. Please ensure both values are valid strings.
User authentication required. Please authenticate before accessing this resource.
You do not have permission to view this case. Ensure you have the correct user permissions.
No case exists with the given case_id. Please verify the case_id.

500.description: Internal Server Error (Error fetching case details)

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the case details. Please try again later.

get.summary: Fetch subcases of a specific case
get.description: Retrieves all subcases of a specific case by parent_id.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID associated with the subcases.

parameters.name: parent_id

message.example: Fetched subcases successfully

An error occurred while fetching the subcases. Please try again later.
